title: 1990 से 2020 के बीच काम करने वाले मज़दूरों को 1.2 लाख के लाभ वाला फ़ेक मेसेज हुआ वायरल
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
@LabourMinistry

 The workers who worked between the 1990 and 2020, have the right to receive the *benefit of ₹120000 from Ministry of Labour and Employment*. Check if your name is in the list of the people who have the rights to withdraw this benefits. https://t.co/8zZokc7iv7pic.twitter.com/5Z6O8TMJCE
